titles.title: Tribal COVID–19 Disaster Assistance Cost Share Relief Act
Tribal COVID–19 Disaster Assistance Cost Share Relief Act
To waive the cost share requirement for Indian Tribes receiving disaster assistance relating to COVID-19, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Tribal COVID-19 Disaster Assistance Cost Share Relief Act
This bill increases to 100% the federal share of certain disaster assistance provided to Indian tribal governments in connection with COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
